sentences.en: " Mr. Li is not only the school's benefactor, but also our savior. "
sentences.cn: 李先生不但是学校的功臣, 并且是我们的救命恩人 —— ”

sentences.en: "And now, without further ado, let me introduce our benefactor."
sentences.cn: “下面，闲话少说，让我来介绍一下我们的赞助人。”
一位没留姓名的捐助人捐款二百万美元。

sentences.en: An anonymous benefactor donated 5 , 000 US dollars to our organization yesterday.
sentences.cn: 一位不愿具名的捐助者昨天捐了五千块美金到我们的机构.

sentences.en: He is a great benefactor to this company, thus receives favourable treatment.
sentences.cn: 他是这家公司的大恩人, 所以受到厚遇.

sentences.en: He was not insolent to his benefactor, he was simply insensible.
sentences.cn: 他对他的恩人并非无礼, 他只是漫不经心.

sentences.en: I only saw a man who had meant to be my benefactor.
sentences.cn: 我只觉得这个人待我恩重如山.

sentences.en: I was so blind as not to recongnize my benefactor.
sentences.cn: 我真是瞎眼了,连大恩人都没认出来.

sentences.en: Our benefactor made up the total with a cheque for $ 4,000.
sentences.cn: 我们的捐助人给了一张4,000美元的支票,凑够了全部的金额.

sentences.en: Scrooge later became Tiny Tim's benefactor.
sentences.cn: 斯克路基后来成了蒂尼·蒂姆的保护人.

sentences.en: She perceived I had discovered my real benefactor.
sentences.cn: 她知道我已经明白了我真正的恩主是谁.

sentences.en: Since that evening Rosenthal has emerged as Robinson's benefactor.
sentences.cn: 从那天晚上起罗森塔尔便成了鲁宾逊的保护人.

sentences.en: The benefactor has done for the old lady for years.
sentences.cn: 这个慈善家照顾那老妇人有好几年.

sentences.en: They feared its mystery benefactor - a private company - might get skittish.
sentences.cn: 他们担心塑像的神秘赞助者 ─ ─一家私人公司 ─ ─会临时改变主意.

sentences.en: We collected ￡478 , but a very generous benefactor made it up to ￡500.
sentences.cn: 我们募捐了478英镑, 一位非常慷慨的捐款人凑足到500英镑.

sentences.en: Your gratitude should have rendered you incapable of such conduct towards your benefactor.
sentences.cn: 你那感恩戴德之心,使你不可能对您的恩人做出这种事来.

trans.tran_en: someone who gives money for a good purpose
